description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cphia","text":"Transformation is the process of inducing chemically competent E. coli to take up a plasmid. We do this in order to use E. coli as a \"DNA copier\" -- the bacterium takes up the plasmid, then copies it as it copies its own genomic DNA. We can grow up as many E. coli as we like in a liquid culture -- each of which has 20-50 copies of the plasmid -- then extract the plasmid DNA back out of the bacteria in the culture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":14},{"style":"italic","offset":63,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2scl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffhgo","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6h8ij","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"23276E7018D911EDA183BD736DDD6C01","height":302,"id":280511,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"cloning1.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/it8bbvh6p.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/it79bvh6p.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/it8abvh6p.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/it78bvh6p.webp","width":463}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"fj6tr","text":"Time and temperature are critical parameters here -- make sure to follow the instructions very closely. For example, if the instructions read \"heat shock in a water bath at   for exactly  \", don't grab your tube out of the ice bucket, wander over to the water bath, get distracted chatting to friends, etc. Instead, bring your ice bucket with your cells to the water bath, put the cells in the water bath for 30 seconds, and then put them immediately back on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":173,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":187,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6m0r7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0E0502E018DA11EDA183BD736DDD6C01","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"42","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"09C5F9A018DA11EDA183BD736DDD6C01","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ct80r","text":"Retrieve the two tubes of chemically competent E. coli cells from the   freezer and place them immediately on ice. {"blocks":[{"key":"12sr9","text":"Add   of DNA from your ligation to a tube of cells. {"blocks":[{"key":"ehhe9","text":"For each transformation, pipette   onto the center of the plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"brc6n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"E345F2B018DB11EDA183BD736DDD6C01","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

title: Transforming E. coli
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"2sffm","text":"This protocol creates genetically modified organisms (GMOs) -- in particular, the E. coli bacteria become antibiotic-resistant. Make sure to dispose of contaminated plastics and cultures as instructed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80nk7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brjpq","text":"None of the materials in this lab are hazardous.  HOWEVER, we are shedding nucleases -- enzymes that degrade DNA -- all the time. Wear lab coats and gloves to keep your samples nuclease-free.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
